overall.description: Roll array elements along a given axis.

shift.description: The number of places by which elements are shifted.  If a tuple, then axis must be a tuple of the same size, and each of the given axes is shifted by the corresponding number.  If an int while axis is a tuple of ints, then the same value is used for all given axes.

axis.type: int or tuple of ints, optional
axis.description: Axis or axes along which elements are shifted.  By default, the array is flattened before shifting, after which the original shape is restored.

res.description: Output array, with the same shape as a.
